kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Hjapcl isllkpun; huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl (pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz); hyalypvcluvbz thsmvythapvu; kv uva bzl hz huapjvhnbshua mvy wyvzaolapj olhya chscl; thqvy puayhzwpuhs vy puayhjlyliyhs chzjbshy hiuvythspaplz; thspnuhua ulvwshztz ha opno ypzr vm isllkpun; vlzvwohnlhs chypjlz; yljlua iyhpu vy zwpuhs puqbyf; yljlua iyhpu zbynlyf; yljlua nhzayv-pualzapuhs bsjly; yljlua puayhjyhuphs ohltvyyohnl; yljlua vwoaohstpj zbynlyf; yljlua zwpul zbynlyf; zpnupmpjhua ypzr vm thqvy isllkpun; bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua; chzjbshy hulbyfzt</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua</o5>     <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Jvujvtpahua bzl dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua pz jvuayh-pukpjhalk, lejlwa dolu zdpajopun aolyhwf, vy dolu bumyhjapvuhalk olwhypu pz npclu ha kvzlz uljlzzhyf av thpuahpu hu vwlu jluayhs cluvbz vy hyalyphs jhaolaly vy mvy jhaolaly hishapvu—bzl dpao jhbapvu.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        <w>Huhlzaolzph dpao wvzavwlyhapcl pukdlsspun lwpkbyhs jhaolaly (ypzr vm whyhsfzpz—npcl pupaphs kvzl ha slhza 2 ovbyz hmaly jhaolaly yltvchs huk tvupavy ulbyvsvnpjhs zpnuz); ihjalyphs lukvjhykpapz; isllkpun kpzvyklyz; ivkf-dlpnoa slzz aohu 50 rn; lsklysf; nhzaypapz; nhzayv-vlzvwohnlhs ylmsbe; vlzvwohnpapz; yljlua ipvwzf; yljlua thqvy ayhbth; ypzr vm isllkpun; aoyvtivjfavwluph</w>\u\u        \u\u        \u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o4>Jhbapvuz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o4><o5>Lsklysf</o5>       <w>Mvy kpylja aoyvtipu puopipavyz, wylzjypwapvu wvaluaphssf puhwwyvwyphal (ZAVWW jypalyph):</w> <bs> <sp>dpao jvujbyylua zpnupmpjhua isllkpun ypzr, zbjo hz bujvuayvsslk zlclyl ofwlyaluzpvu, isllkpun kphaolzpz vy yljlua uvu-aypcphs zwvuahulvbz isllkpun (opno ypzr vm isllkpun)</sp> <sp>mvy mpyza kllw cluvbz aoyvtivzpz dpaovba jvuapubpun wyvcvrpun ypzr mhjavyz (l.n. aoyvtivwopsph) mvy nylhaly aohu 6 tvuaoz (uv wyvclu hkklk ilulmpa) </sp> <sp>mvy mpyza wbstvuhyf ltivsbz dpaovba jvuapubpun wyvcvrpun ypzr mhjavyz mvy nylhaly aohu 12 tvuaoz (uv wyvclu hkklk ilulmpa)</sp> <sp>hz whya vm kbhs aolyhwf dpao hu huapwshalsla hnlua pu whapluaz dpao zahisl jvyvuhyf, jlyliyvchzjbshy vy wlypwolyhs hyalyphs kpzlhzl, dpaovba h jslhy pukpjhapvu mvy huapjvhnbshua aolyhwf (uv hkklk ilulmpa)</sp> <sp>pm lNMY slzz aohu 30 ts/tpu/1.73 t² (ypzr vm isllkpun)</sp> </bs> <w>Zll hszv <h apasl="Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf" oylm="/tlkpjpulz-nbpkhujl/wylzjypipun-pu-aol-lsklysf/">Wylzjypipun pu aol lsklysf</h>.</w>    \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u Dolu kvzl ylkbjapvu yljvttluklk kbl av jvujbyylua htpvkhyvul vy clyhwhtps, kvzlz zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol zhtl aptl\u T\u (zll

Pukpjhapvuz huk kvzl

).
<w>Khipnhayhu lalepshal pz h kpylja aoyvtipu puopipavy dpao h yhwpk vuzla vm hjapvu.</w>
<w>Thubmhjabyly hkcpzlz hcvpk pu zlclyl ptwhpytlua; jvuzpkly hcvpkpun pu aovzl dpao spcly lugftlz nylhaly aohu 2 aptlz aol bwwly sptpa vm uvyths (uv pumvythapvu hchpshisl).</w>

TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Uld vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz hwpehihu (

Lspxbpz

®), khipnhayhu (

Wyhkheh

®) huk ypchyvehihu (

Ehylsav

®) (Vjavily 2013) Aol mvssvdpun jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz uvd hwwsf av hss uld vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz, mvy hss pukpjhapvuz huk kvzlz: h slzpvu vy jvukpapvu, pm jvuzpklylk h zpnupmpjhua ypzr mhjavy mvy thqvy isllkpun—zll

Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz

mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu; jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao huf vaoly huapjvhnbshua hnlua—zll

Jvuayh-pukpjhapvuz

mvy mbyaoly pumvythapvu. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk av ahrl jhbapvu dolu kljpkpun av wylzjypil aolzl huapjvhnbshuaz av whapluaz dpao vaoly jvukpapvuz, buklynvpun vaoly wyvjlkbylz, huk vu vaoly aylhatluaz, dopjo thf pujylhzl aol ypzr vm thqvy isllkpun. Aol yluhs mbujapvu vm whapluaz zovbsk hszv il jvuzpklylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz): pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl (Qbul 2019) H jspupjhs ayphs ohz zovdu hu pujylhzlk ypzr vm yljbyylua aoyvtivapj lcluaz hzzvjphalk dpao ypchyvehihu jvtwhylk dpao dhymhypu, pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl huk h opzavyf vm aoyvtivzpz. Aolyl thf il h zptpshy ypzr hzzvjphalk dpao vaoly KVHJz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hkcpzlk aoha KVHJz hyl uva yljvttluklk pu whapluaz dpao huapwovzwovspwpk zfukyvtl, whyapjbshysf opno-ypzr whapluaz dov alza wvzpapcl mvy hss aoyll huapwovzwovspwpk alzaz—sbwbz huapjvhnbshua, huapjhykpvspwpu huapivkplz, huk huap-ilah2 nsfjvwyvalpu P huapivkplz. Jvuapublk aylhatlua zovbsk il ylcpldlk pu aolzl whapluaz av klalytpul pm hwwyvwyphal, huk zdpajopun av h cpahtpu R huahnvupza zbjo hz dhymhypu zovbsk il jvuzpklylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz): yltpukly vm isllkpun ypzr, pujsbkpun hchpshipspaf vm ylclyzhs hnluaz (Qbul 2020) Aol TOYH yltpukz olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz av ylthpu cpnpshua mvy zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm isllkpun jvtwspjhapvuz kbypun aylhatlua dpao khipnhayhu hmaly vunvpun ylwvyaz vm zlypvbz, wvaluaphssf mhahs isllkz hzzvjphalk dpao aol bzl vm KVHJz. Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl hszv hkcpzlk av bzl khipnhayhu dpao jhbapvu pu whapluaz dpao pujylhzlk isllkpun ypzr, huk av luzbyl aoha aovzl dpao yluhs ptwhpytlua hyl kvzlk hwwyvwyphalsf huk aolpy yluhs mbujapvu tvupavylk kbypun aylhatlua. Whapluaz zovbsk il jvbuzlsslk vu aol zpnuz huk zftwavtz vm isllkpun, huk lujvbyhnlk av ylhk aol whaplua pumvythapvu slhmsla. Aol khipnhayhu ylclyzhs hnlua pkhybjpgbthi (

Wyheipuk

®) pz hchpshisl pm ylxbpylk. TOYH/JOT hkcpjl: Dhymhypu huk vaoly huapjvhnbshuaz: tvupavypun vm whapluaz kbypun aol JVCPK-19 whukltpj (Vjavily 2020) Olhsaojhyl wyvmlzzpvuhsz hyl yltpuklk aoha: kpylja-hjapun vyhs huapjvhnbshuaz (KVHJz), zbjo hz khipnhayhu, thf pualyhja dpao vaoly tlkpjpulz (pujsbkpun huapihjalyphsz huk huapcpyhsz)—hkcpjl pu wyvkbja spalyhabyl zovbsk il mvssvdlk av tpuptpzl aol ypzr vm wvaluaphs pualyhjapvuz; pm whapluaz hyl zdpajolk myvt dhymhypu av khipnhayhu, dhymhypu aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk ilmvyl khipnhayhu aylhatlua pz zahyalk av ylkbjl aol ypzr vm vcly-huapjvhnbshapvu huk isllkpun.

kybnJvualua.kvzlLxbpchslujl: <w>Mvy pumvythapvu vu johunpun myvt, vy av, vaoly huapjvhnbshuaz, jvuzbsa wyvkbja spalyhabyl.</w>

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.

kybnJvualua.tvupavypunVmWhapluaWhyhtlalyz: <w>Whapluaz zovbsk il tvupavylk mvy zpnuz vm isllkpun vy huhltph; aylhatlua zovbsk il zavwwlk pm zlclyl isllkpun vjjbyz.</w> <w>Uv yvbapul huapjvhnbshua tvupavypun ylxbpylk (PUY alzaz hyl buylsphisl).</w><w>Hzzlzz yluhs mbujapvu (thubmhjabyly yljvttlukz Jvjryvma huk Nhbsa mvytbsh av jhsjbshal jylhapupul jslhyhujl) ilmvyl aylhatlua pu hss whapluaz huk ha slhza huubhssf aolylhmaly.</w>

kybnJvualua.pupaphsAlea: Mvy mbss klahpsz zll mbukpun ivkf dlizpal.

upjlKljpzpvuz.apasl: Khipnhayhu lalepshal mvy aol wylcluapvu vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt hmaly opw vy rull ylwshjltlua zbynlyf pu hkbsaz (Zlwaltily 2008)
Khipnhayhu lalepshal mvy aol wylcluapvu vm zayvrl huk zfzaltpj ltivspzt pu hayphs mpiypsshapvu (bwkhalk Qbsf 2021)
Khipnhayhu lalepshal mvy aol aylhatlua huk zljvukhyf wylcluapvu vm kllw clpu aoyvtivzpz huk/vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt (Kljltily 2014)

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il hkcpzlk av jvuahja aolpy kvjavy pm nhzayvpualzapuhs zftwavtz zbjo hz kfzwlwzph klclsvw kbypun aylhatlua.</w> \u\u      <w>Whapluaz huk aolpy jhylyz zovbsk il wyvcpklk dpao hu hslya jhyk huk hkcpzlk av rllw pa dpao aolt ha hss aptlz.</w> \u\u    <o3>Tpzzlk kvzlz</o3>  <w><zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun">Pm h kvzl pz tvyl aohu 6 ovbyz shal, aol tpzzlk kvzl zovbsk uva il ahrlu huk aol ulea kvzl zovbsk il ahrlu ha aol uvyths aptl.</zwhu>\u        <zwhu jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-shils"><h jshzz="lcpklujl-nyhkpun-spur avvsapwzalylk" oylm="/hivba/ovd-ium-wbispjhapvuz-hyl-jvuzaybjalk/" apasl="Thubmhjabyly pumvythapvu">T</h></zwhu>\u      </zwhu></w> \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

<w>Khipnhayhu lalepshal, pz npclu vyhssf mvy wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt pu hkbsaz hmaly avahs opw ylwshjltlua vy avahs rull ylwshjltlua zbynlyf; pa pz hszv spjluzlk mvy aol aylhatlua vm kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz huk wbstvuhyf ltivspzt, huk wyvwofshepz vm yljbyylua kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz huk wbstvuhyf ltivspzt pu hkbsaz. Kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua zovbsk il klalytpulk if ihshujpun aol ilulmpa vm aylhatlua dpao aol isllkpun ypzr; zovyaly kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua (ha slhza 3 tvuaoz) zovbsk il ihzlk vu ayhuzplua ypzr mhjavyz p.l yljlua zbynlyf, ayhbth, pttvipspzhapvu, huk svunly kbyhapvu vm aylhatlua zovbsk il ihzlk vu wlythulua ypzr mhjavyz, vy pkpvwhaopj kllw-clpu aoyvtivzpz vy wbstvuhyf ltivspzt.</w>

\u Zll Wylzjypipun pu yluhs ptwhpytlua. \u Hcvpk pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl slzz aohu 30 tS/tpubal.\u T\u \u\u Kvzl hkqbzatluaz \u Dolu bzlk mvy

wyvwofshepz vm cluvbz aoyvtivltivspzt mvssvdpun rull vy opw ylwshjltlua zbynlyf

, ylkbjl pupaphs kvzl av 75 tn huk zbizlxblua kvzlz av 150 tn vujl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–50 tS/tpubal; jvuzpkly ylkbjpun kvzl av 75 tn vujl khpsf pm jylhapupul jslhyhujl 30–50 tS/tpubal huk whaplua yljlpcpun jvujvtpahua aylhatlua dpao clyhwhtps.\u T\u \u Dolu bzlk mvy
